    net.kemitix.mon.result
    <h1>Result</h1> Allows handling error conditions without the need to catch exceptions.

    • Uses of Either in net.kemitix.mon.experimental.either

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default Either<Throwable,​T> Result.toEither()
      Converts the Result into an Either.
      Methods in net.kemitix.mon.result with parameters of type Either 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static <T> Result<T> Result.from​(Either<Throwable,​T> either)
      Creates a Result from the Either, where the Result will be an error if the Either is a Left, and a success if it is a Right.
